column6:
"Hey Cyclops, you seen my powers anywhere?" ,2007,2
"Naw."
"Ay-ay, where my wings go at?"
"Dag, I'm all havin' to lift up my coffee with my HANDS, yo."
"Dang. We cold done lost our powerz."
Rated A ...$2.99
